mapper.select: SELECT A.CBNO AS CBNO, A.CBSUBJECT AS CBSUBJECT, A.CBNAME AS CBNAME, A.CBCONTENT AS CBCONTENT, A.ACADEMY_ANO AS ACADEMY_ANO, A.MEMBER_MNO AS MEMBER_MNO, A.CDELETEYN AS CDELETEYN, TO_CHAR(A.CINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.CUPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CUPDATEDATE FROM CONSULTBOARD A WHERE CDELETEYN = 'N' ORDER BY 1 DESC
